diff_hunk:
@@ -2220,6 +2221,15 @@
         - arg: THTensor* self
           broadcast: exponent fallback
         - THTensor* exponent
+]]
+[[
+  name: pow
+  types:
+    - floating_point
+  variants:
+    - function
body:
This declaration (tpow) doesn't make sense as a method, since it's in the form `2^x`. The first argument is always a float.

The existing pow method doesn't treat this overload as a method.

When it was combined, the function_wrapper.py just ignored this overload because the signature looked like a duplicate.
body_html:
This declaration (tpow) doesn't make sense as a method, since it's in the form 2^x. The first argument is always a float.

The existing pow method doesn't treat this overload as a method.

When it was combined, the function_wrapper.py just ignored this overload because the signature looked like a duplicate.
body_text:
This declaration (tpow) doesn't make sense as a method, since it's in the form 2^x. The first argument is always a float.
The existing pow method doesn't treat this overload as a method.
When it was combined, the function_wrapper.py just ignored this overload because the signature looked like a duplicate.
